profilePage.biography: With over 4 years of experience in the web development industry, I am a passionate and dedicated professional capable of handling projects from all angles. My education at the Guglielmo Marconi Institute in Catania provided me with a solid theoretical foundation, which I was able to enrich through a series of significant work experiences. I've had the opportunity to work on various projects, both as a developer and a team leader. My leadership experience has allowed me to guide teams of programmers, ensuring that projects are successfully completed within the expected timelines. Interests & Passions: Beyond my passion for programming, I have a deep interest in environmental issues, photography, and electronics. Technology and innovation are always at the forefront of my interests, and I continually seek to stay updated with the latest industry trends.
profilePage.skills: Nel corso degli anni, ho sviluppato una profonda competenza nel settore frontend, diventando abile nell'utilizzare una vasta gamma di framework e librerie. JavaScript e TypeScript sono diventati per me  come una seconda lingua, grazie alla mia esperienza con React e Next.js. Ho sviluppato un'occhio critico per il design e l'usabilità, e ho adottato strumenti come Chakra UI e Tailwind CSS per garantire che le mie applicazioni siano non solo funzionali, ma anche esteticamente piacevoli. L'uso di Lit.js ha poi arricchito la mia capacità di creare componenti leggeri e modulari
